<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_rrc_sm_tarea_apoyo</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>slx test</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

			var myUs = '';
		
		var user = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		user.addQuery('sys_id',gs.getUserID());
		user.query();
		if(user.next())
		{ myUs = user.u_slx_unidad_servicio;}
	
	
	if (current.short_description!='')
		{ gs.addInfoMessage('algo');
			gs.addInfoMessage('muestra : ' + myUs);
			gs.addInfoMessage('algo : ' + current.u_slx_unidad_de_servicio);
			current.short_description = 'nuevo';
		}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>slx.jp</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-10-07 06:21:29</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>bb108ed21b508c1021022026ec4bcb9d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>slx test</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Gestión de Servicios" source="x_rrc_sm">bfdce94f1bd3b30021022026ec4bcb2e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Gestión de Servicios">bfdce94f1bd3b30021022026ec4bcb2e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_bb108ed21b508c1021022026ec4bcb9d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>slx.jp</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-10-11 06:52:07</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=bb108ed21b508c1021022026ec4bcb9d"/></record_update>
